title: Why did you choose AIIMS Raipur over other state colleges? - Quora
tags: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Raipur
All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS)

response.answer_text: The tag of being an AIIMSonian is most definitely a deciding factor for many, as it was for me. And Raipur is the closest to my hometown, that's the second reason. Thirdly, I met the Dean - Dr. SP Dhaneria sir during the process of counselling, who resolved the many queries me and my parents had about the institute (very patiently and politely), which delighted and reassured us that it was the right choice. Since my admission I've realized that there are many advantages to being in a national level institute, but that is a tale for another day :)
